column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Variety / Mastery: They make mostly Ramen
column2: and they're pretty skilled at making good Ramen. I'd consider their authenticity and craft to be much better than some of the other Ramen places around
column4: and chashu that actually tasted realistic. Although
column5: if you don't want traditional Ramen
column6: they do have Vegetarian or Vegan Ramen and also many different meal sized appetizers you can try by yourself or with a group.
